title: A certain investment earned a fixed rate of 4 percent DS07839
author: Quant Reasoning
comment: Hey just want to let you know that these video lessons are really valuable

However a quick suggestion from my end would be that if you could organise these in a playlist topic wise. It would be really useful. 
A student looking for help under a particular subject will know exactly where to look.. 
And for you views for older videos might increase
description:
GMAT DS07839

A certain investment earned a fixed rate of 4 percent interest per year, compounded annually, for five years. The interest earned for the third year of the investment was how many dollars greater than that for the first year?

(1) The amount of the investment at the beginning of the second year was $4,160.00.
(2) The amount of the investment at the beginning of the third year was $4,326.40.
